metadata.title: CVE-2012-1590 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The forum list in Drupal 7.x before 7.14 does not properly check userpermissions for unpublished forum posts, which allows remote authenticatedusers to obtain sensitive information such as the post title via the forumoverview page.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-1590` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

drupal7 - 7.14-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: drupal7 package in esm-apps/xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7.14-1').
